transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello, ha sir.

Customer: Ha.
IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu, parvez bol raha hu, correct? Ye amount apna pending hai, process karna jaruri hai IndiaMART se balance payment.

Executive: Nahi sir, abhi to nahi hoga, time lagega.

Customer: To ye deal kyu convert ho jayegi aapki? Mail aa raha hai bar bar. IndiaMART par jab 7 tarikh ko hi payment process karna tha to hum 7 days tak 7 days tak aap request karo. Kya hai?

Hamare yaha se account team us chiz ko tackle karti hai aur apne hisab se wo deal jo hai wo convert kar deti hai.

Customer: To ye mail abhi just mail aaya isliye maine kaha aapse kal baat ki aapne kaha tha aaj kar denge ise.

Executive: Nahi sir, abhi to nahi hoga, time lagega.

Customer: Time lagega sir. To ye na deal convert ho rahi hai ab, thik hai? Ye 6 mahine me kitne time lagega, kitne din me band rahi hai? Ye deal kitne din me band jayegi? Kya duration hai deal sir? Ek do din lagenge.

Executive: Ek saal ka tha na jo aapne char do category ka liya hua tha.

Customer: Exactly, abhi kya hai isme? Ek do din me isko convert kar rahe hai.

Customer: Aaj ke liye bola tha unhone tuesday me payment bhi bola tha fir aaj ke liye bol rahe hai.

Executive: Nahi bol rahe nahi ho payega to convert kara do koi baat nahi.

Customer: Hello? Ha?

Customer: Sir aap ye kab tak ho payega aapki team se? Aaj nahi ho payega?

Executive: Nahi aaj to nahi ho payega.

Customer: Matlab kab kab tak ho payega, wahi puch raha hu.

Executive: Ab bata raha hu aapko sham tak me kab hoga.

Customer: Sham tak batayenge sir. Time nahi hai sham tak.

Customer: Aapne tuesday bola tha fir aaj bola tha.

Executive: Wo to bol to diya tha maine par abhi nahi ho raha hai setting to kya karenge? Aaj kya setting ho gayi? Setting hi nahi ho pa raha. To problem ye hai na ki ye convert ho jayega to nuksan ho jayega, bahut bada nuksan ho jayega.

Customer: Samajh rahe hai? Kiska? Aur aapka. Ha hamara hoga na, aapka kuch nahi ho raha hai na?

Customer: Kya?
Hamara nuksan ho raha hai na?

Executive: Bilkul aapka nuksan ho jayega. Ha ha bas jitna discount mila hai na sab khatam ho jayega aur duration actual payment pe duration adjust hoga. Hardly do char mahina chalega fir fayda kya hoga? Chota sa payment hai usko karke khatam kar dijiye isko.

Executive: Sir aisa ye hum sab samajhte hai, pata hai ye. Thoda work karke baad me hum karenge. Ya kal bol hi diya tha 10-15 din me hum denge aapko.

Customer: Sir ek kam kijiye aap convert ye na conversion me ja raha hai. Nahi ho payega hold hai na? Isliye hum log PDC check lete hai sab batane se pehle aapne wo bhi nahi diya.

Customer: Nahi mai kabhi nahi deta hu. PDC check dene ka mera system hi nahi hai. Nahi aap kabhi nahi dete ho bolna alag baat hai. Humne kar hi diya time se hi payment.

Customer: Time se humko kam mil gaya tha humne time se payment kar diya. To service aapne ek saal ke liye liya hai time se matlab samajh nahi pa raha hu kya kehna chah rahe hai. Aap har din bol rahe hai. Jo mere ko karna tha wo nahi hua hai isme.

Customer: Kya aisa hai jo nahi hua hai mujhe bataiye. Kal ki date me mujhse baat ki. Kal bataya hi tha na maine. Ab wo bol rahe hai ki aap batao word hum likh denge ab hum pata karke bata denge na ki ye dalna hai dal do.

Executive: Nahi aap ye keh rahe hai kisi company ka data utha lo aur waha se nahi kar payenge na wo.

Customer: Nahi nahi waise nahi data uthane ka nahi bola hu mai. Hmm hmm hmm. Mai kuch nahi data beta ka bola hu sir mere ko unka data thodi pata hota hai. Inka data ye hai. Mai usko ye bola tha ki mera kam isme ban nahi raha hai aap zara dekho.

Executive: Ha to dekh ke kar diya na jo karna tha hame humne usme pura jo bhi aapka requirement area tha sab kuch kar diya hai. Usme kuch bacha nahi hai karne ke liye. Agar aap us baat ko lekar apna ye nuksan karna chah rahe hai to mai aapko nahi suggest karunga is tarah kijiye kyuki is service ki jo price hai aur jo location hai wo sara point aap ghata lenge.

Customer: Ab chote paise me kya ghata lenge? Ghate jayega to koi baat nahi.

Executive: To fir hum itna discussion hi kyu kar rahe hai jab aapko koi nuksan ka pata hi nahi hai parwahi nahi hai to jane dijiye.

Customer: Maine kal hi bata diya tha. Ki kal ka aapne aaj ki date di thi payment ke liye. Hai? Aapne to aaj ke liye payment ke liye bola tha. Pehle aapne tuesday bola tha. Maine bola tha mera kam aisa ho jana kal bola ki hamari company wo bend laga diya wo ho gaya. Humko nahi pata tha na pehle hota to lafda hoga. To aap ek baat bataiye agreement hum logo ke bich hua hai jiske jiske andar hame paisa proceed karna hai 50% advance aapne kar diya. Bacha hua paisa aapko dena tha. Jo aapne jo aapka time tha us time aapne diya nahi. Kam nahi hoga to bhi paisa de denge aisa agreement hai hamara ke kam chahe ho chahe na ho paisa dena padega.

Executive: Sir ye aap char bar delay kar chuke hai aap kam kaun sa kam keh rahe hai maine aapko bata diya ki usme aisa koi kam pending nahi hai. Baki kuch nahi hai. Jane dijiye na pending nahi hai to kam nahi ban raha hai hum wahi bol rahe hai na ki account dekh lo kam kyu nahi ho raha hai.

Executive: Sir kaun sa kam nahi ho raha hai sab to kal bhi baat ki. Kaun sa delay kiya hai maine? Kaun sa delay kiya hai tum bata rahe ho char bar delay kiya kaun sa delay kiya? Balance payment jo aap nahi de pa rahe hai uski mai baat kar raha tha.

Customer: Kaun sa maine char bar payment delay kiya wo pehle batao. Galti ho gayi aapko deal deke fir aap aisa keh rahe hai mai parvez ko mana hi kar raha tha. To chalo aapke bhai aapke favor me ja ke aapse deal kar ke. To nahi dena chahiye na mai thodi jabardasti bol raha tha mere ko do hi do.

Executive: Nahi to aapne liya to at least tay waqt pe balance payment to clear kijiye mai ye keh raha hu. Sambhalna chahiye na aapko company bhi liya hai to kuch kar karke bhi dena padta hai na. Hum yaha tum waha kam karke baithe ho to kam kaise lete ho customer? To usme mai bola tha ki aise thoda kam karo yaar. Kam nahi ban raha hai. Bola tha dusri company ka word isme dhund ke dal do.

Executive: Sir kam jo ban nahi raha hai. Bol raha hai ki mai mere hisab se dal du mail karke de de. Ha suno.

Executive: To usme kuch aisa hai hi nahi addition ke liye aap kya kehna chah rahe hai mai samajh hi nahi pa raha hu. Sab chiz added hai. Bata hu na sir addition karke mai deta hu mai isliye bola na ki mai aapko dunga ki ye dal do word. To wo aap de dijiye usme koi dikkat nahi. Wo aap de sakte hai kabhi bhi de sakte hai aap ye package nahi bhi lete tab bhi de dete. Is package se us addition ka kya connection hai?

Customer: To mai package ye liya na to baat yahi hua tha. Is package se aapke kam hoga isme se badhiya aise kam hoga nahi to mera trust seal chali jayegi. Addition to aap de sakte hai aap 30000 denge tabhi hum addition karenge ye kaun si baat hui ki aap keh rahe hai ki uska kam sahi hai paisa nahi denge. Are catalog ka to addition chalta rehta hai sir. Hamare paas 30000 jo dete hai unka bhi hum wahi kam karte hai jitna aapka 10 lakh wala. Sir abhi to time lagega lamba chauda khichne ka baat nahi hai time thoda lagega aap de sakte hai to dijiye aapko nuksan ho jayega. Aaj to thik hai jane dijiye. Usme nuksan ho jayega. Jane dijiye nahi aapko bada aasani se aap keh rahe hai ki jane dijiye lekin aapko nuksan ho raha hai lagbhag 80000 ka. Aap itna aasani se bol rahe hai jane dijiye. Ha koi baat nahi. Thik hai aap mai mai keh deta hu wo aage convert kar dene ke liye waise bhi 30000 hi bacha tha aapka 35000. Is paiso ke liye agar aap itna ye kar rahe hai to thik hai aapka convert ho jayega. Thik hai. Thik hai. Convert karwa dete hai hum log. Thik hai bol dete hai. Kyuki 10-15 din ka waiting process nahi ho payega thik hai. Thik hai. Aapko mai mail kar dunga. Ek hi din ho gaya sorry 30 din hai bhai. Mai nahi ye karunga. Aur mai aapko future ke liye bata raha hu koi bhi deal kijiye na thoda sareen tarike se kijiye. Aisa idhar udhar ke discussion me jane se acha hai ek sareen deal kijiye. Aap keh rahe hai ki maine PDC nahi diya. Aapne nahi diya aisa nahi hai humne aapko favor kiya hai ye sochiye aaj ki date me koi bhi deal bina PDC ke IndiaMART se nahi hoti hai. To humne kiya hai agli barbaar dekhna chahta hu hamara hai. Ha? Agla bhi hua hi hai hamara PDC ke bina. Agla pichla ab aaj ki tarikh me koi bhi deal chahe wo 1 lakh ki bhi ho ya 20000 30000 ki bhi ho bina PDC ke nahi hoti hai. Thik hai? Aapko agli barbaar nahi karna PDC bhi nahi karna aap logo ne galti kar di. Hum logo ne galti kar di jo aapse PDC nahi li. Hai na? Ye keh rahe hai. Khair galti ya sahi thoda hatate hai. Ultimately isme nuksan IndiaMART ka nahi aapka hai aap ye baat samajhiye. Ha mera hi nuksan hai mera aapka kuch nahi nuksan hai mere ko bataiye. Aapka kya nuksan hoga? Mai yaha deal karwa deta hu aapko thik hai ab service ke time se chalega kya hua teen mahina aur extra chalega mushkil se aap iske baad jo bhi. Are aaj hi band kar do aisa mail me likh ke de do aaj sham ko band kar dalo iska service. Baat khatam kar do. Bas. Mai mail karwa deta hu, thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's work is not progressing as expected.

- Deal conversion may lead to financial loss.

- Disagreement over payment terms and service expectations.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to process the deal conversion.

- Executive explained the standard process and PDC check.

- Executive offered to close the service immediately.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a mail regarding conversion.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, payment, conversion, pdc, service
